property.name: archiva_jetty_port
property.description: Port on which archiva web UI will be hosted

property.name: ARCHIVA_ADMIN_PASSWORD
property.description: The password of the administrator, only created during installation This password, due to a bug in Archiva, is currently limited to max 8 characters Please therefore use a very strong 8-character mix and do not expose as a public internet endpoint

property.name: install_topdir
property.description: Install Location for Archiva. I will make a subdirectory called install_subdir in this location. must be at least 4 characters and contain two '/'

property.name: install_subdir
property.description: Install Location for Archiva. I will make a subdirectory called this in the install_topdir location.

property.name: ARCHIVA_ADMIN
property.description: The username of the administrator, only created during installation

property.name: ARCHIVA_ADMIN_FULLNAME
property.description: The username of the administrator, only created during installation

property.name: ARCHIVA_ADMIN_EMAIL
property.description: The email of the administrator, only created during installation the value default will then construct username@hotstname
